data.eml:eml: A new mycophagous species of the genus Gaurax Loew, 1863 (Diptera: Chloropidae) from Benin, Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nartshuk, Emilia P., Kurina, Olavi (2014): A new mycophagous species of the genus Gaurax Loew, 1863 (Diptera: Chloropidae) from Benin, Africa. Zootaxa 3873 (3): 297-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.3.9
